title: Astounding Science Fiction v41n3
creator: Street and Smith Publications
description: Astounding Science Fiction , Volume 41 Number 3, May of 1948. Published by Street & Smith Publications,  Inc., New York, NY. 164 pages. Cover art by Alejandro de Cañedo. Edited by John W. Campbell, Jr. Featuring essays by John W. Campbell, Jr. as The Editor, E. L. Locke (Part 1 of 2) and  P. Schuyler Miller. With a letter from author Willy Ley in the Brass Tacks column about the all the disbelief and followup he received over his Nazi propaganda essay in the May 1947 issue. Includes the following works of fiction: The Rull, a novelette in the Rull series by A. E. van Vogt. The Strange Case of John Kingman, shortstory by Murray Leinster. The Obsolete Weapon, a shortstory by L. Ron Hubbard. The Mechanical Answer, a shortstory by John D. MacDonald. ...And Searching Mind (Part 3 of 3, Humanoids series 2), a serial by Jack Williamson.
